creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Aumio - Ein glückliches Leben beginnt im Kopf

Begleite uns auf eine Reise durch die faszinierende Welt der Gefühle! Spielerische Meditationen, kurze Geschichten & Hörspiele helfen deiner Familie bei Themen wie Schlaf, Konzentration, Stress und Angst. Aumio ist für jedes Alter geeignet - für Kinder & Jugendliche genauso wie für Eltern & Erwachsene.

Alle unsere Übungen und Kurse sind wissenschaftlich fundiert und wurden mit Experten entwickelt. Mit Aumio lernen Kinder & Eltern leichter zu entspannen, sich einfacher zu konzentrieren und besser mit Emotionen umzugehen. Im Familien-Alltag und in der Schule. Heb jetzt gemeinsam mit deinem Kind ab auf eine Reise durch den inneren Kosmos.

Was euch erwartet:

- Alles rund ums Thema Meditation und Achtsamkeit für Eltern & Kinder
- Ein kostenloser Einführungskurs, in dem Kinder die Grundlagen zu Meditation und Achtsamkeit lernen
- Einfache Hilfe für schnelle Entspannung & besseren Schlaf
- Meditationen, Achtsamkeitsübungen und Yoga für Kinder mit Tatendrang
- Spielerisches Design: Dein Kind fliegt mit Aumio von Planet zu Planet, erlebt Abenteuer und sammelt Abzeichen und Sterne
- 5-7 minütige Geschichten und Übungen, die deinem Kind helfen das Chaos in Kopf zu beruhigen
- Täglich wechselnde Übungen
- Eine ständig wachsende Anzahl an Premium-Kursen zu Themen wie Angst, Konzentration oder Unruhe
- Alle Inhalte basieren auf wissenschaftlichen Erkenntnissen und wurden speziell mit und für Kinder & Familien entwickelt

Bald verfügbar:

- Mehr Entspannung: Weitere Gute Nacht Geschichten, Meditationen und Hörspiele zum Entspannen & Einschlafen
- Mehr Bewegung: Neue Inhalte aus Kinderyoga und Sport für körperliche Gesundheit
- SOS Übungen: Schnelle Hilfe bei Wutausbrüchen, Hausaufgaben oder anderen schwierigen Situationen für Eltern
- Lernspiele: In interaktiven Spielen lernen Kinder ihre Gesundheit zu stärken


Unser Startangebot:

Als Angebot zum Raketenstart, ist Aumio ist derzeit kostenlos verfügbar. Starte noch heute los und teste alle Geschichten, Hörspiele und Aufgaben komplett kostenlos. Der Einführungskurs und dein Fortschritt bleiben dir natürlich für immer kostenlos erhalten.


Möchtest du uns etwas sagen oder benötigst Hilfe?
Dann würden wir uns sehr über eine E-Mail an contact@aumio.de. Wir freuen uns auf deine Nachricht!

P.S.: Wenn deiner Familie die Reise durch den inneren Kosmos gefällt, bewerte uns gerne hier im Store.

title: Aumio: Meditation, Yoga & Schlaf für Familien

creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Aumio - A happy life begins in the mind.

Join us on a journey through the fascinating world of emotions! Mindfulness, playful meditations, short stories & audio books will help your family with issues such as falling asleep, concentration, stress and anxiety. Mindfulness and meditation for everyone, try for free. Aumio is suitable for all ages - for children & teenagers as well as for parents & adults.

All our exercises and courses are scientifically based and have been developed with experts. With Aumio, children & parents learn to relax faster, to concentrate more easily and to deal with emotions better. In everyday family life, at school or as a sleep aid. Take off together with your child on a journey through your inner cosmos.

What to expect:

- Test all content for free: Everything about meditation and mindfulness for parents and children.
- Meditation for all: a free introductory course where children learn the basics of meditation and mindfulness
- Sleep aid: fall asleep faster and sleep better with Aumio's sleep stories
- Audio books, meditations, mindfulness exercises and yoga for kids with a zest for action
- Playful design: your child flies with Aumio from planet to planet, experiences adventures and collects badges and stars
- 5-7 minute stories, meditations and exercises to help your kids calm the chaos in their mind - for less stress and more relaxation
- Daily changing exercises and meditations
- An ever-growing number of premium courses on topics such as mindfulness, anxiety, concentration or restlessness
- SOS exercises: Quick help with tantrums, homework, falling asleep or other difficult situations for parents
- All content is based on scientific findings and was developed especially with and for children & families

Our launch offer:

As a rocket launch offer, our premium offers are significantly reduced. Start today and test all stories, meditations, audio books and exercises for 7 days completely free. The introductory course and your progress will of course remain free forever.

Would you like to tell us something or need help?

Then we would be very happy to receive an email to contact@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If your family likes the journey through the inner cosmos, please rate us here in the store.
descriptionShort: Sleep aid: Stories, sounds & yoga for more relaxation, mindfulness & calm

Ready for your next adventure with Aumio? In this version with:

- multiple profiles for the whole family,
- the ability to customise your interests at any time,
- many beautiful new animations

and other small improvements :) We are looking forward to your feedback!

title: Aumio: Mindful Meditation & Sleep App for Families

creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Aumio - Healthy minds for a happy life!.

Join us on a journey through the fascinating world of emotions! Playful meditations, calm sleep stories & relaxing sounds help you and your kids

- relax together,
- fall asleep weightlessly, and
- grow up happy

Aumio is suitable for all ages - for kids & teenagers as well as for parents & adults. All our exercises and courses are scientifically safe & sound and developed with experts.

Thousands of parents have joined Aumio's mission to help children sleep healthier, relax more easily and deal better with emotions. In everyday family life and at school. With Aumio, your kids get access to hundreds of original stories and meditations, covering a topics such as

- sleep,
- concentration,
- stress & relaxation, or
- anxiety

Take off now and take your child on a journey through the fascinating world of Aumio.

Aumio offers:

- Exclusive meditations, stories and sounds for better sleep and more mindfulness in children's lives
- A free introductory course where children learn the basics of meditation and mindfulness
- Playful tools for better relaxation during the day & healthier sleep at bedtime
- Mindfulness games & exercises for kids who love action
- SOS Exercises: Quick relief during family emergencies like challenging homework or other stressful situations for parents
- 5-7 minute meditations and exercises help your child calm the chaos in their head and fall asleep faster
- Daily changing missions
- A constantly growing number of premium stories and meditations on topics such as sleep, restlessness, anxiety or concentration
- Playful design: your child joins Aumio and his friends on his journey from planet to planet, experiences adventures and collects badges and stars
- All content is based on scientific evidence and developed specifically with and for children & families

Our rocket launch offer:

During our launch, our premium offers are significantly reduced. Start today and test all stories, sounds and meditations for 7 days completely free of charge. The introductory course and your progress will of course remain free of charge forever.

Contact

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help?
Then we would be very happy to receive an email to contact@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If your family likes the journey through the inner cosmos, please rate us here in the store.

title: Aumio: Sleep & Meditation App

creator: Aumio
descriptionHtml:
Aumio is the number one sleep and mindfulness cosmos for children. With our original audio content, weekly updates and parenting advice, we have empowered over 200,000 kids and parents around the world to lead a healthy and happy family life. Hundreds of sleep-stories, meditations and soundscapes help children sleep faster and enjoy relaxed family moments. Based on science, yet truly magical, and recommended by children.

Aumio helps you and your child to
- relax together,
- fall asleep, like on clouds, and
- grow up happy
- and much more

FOR YOUR FAMILY LIFE

Children fall asleep 37 minutes faster. This is what realxed parents tell us. For all children from 0-10 years - Aumio's different content is suitable for all children. As a relaxation music for infants, as a sleep aid after daycare, or to wind down before homework. With valuable features, we ensure that Aumio is a mindful listening experience: ad-free, no data collection, usable in flight mode. Plus, Aumio is listed in the kidSAFE program.

More than 200,000 parents have joined our mission to help kids relax easier, focus better, and manage their emotions. In everyday family life and at school. With Aumio, you get access to hundreds of pieces of content on topics like

- sleep,
- concentration,
- stress & relaxation, or
- anxiety


LISTEN IN AND RELAX

Make your evening the most relaxing family time of the day. Listen to one of our stories right now, and take your child on a journey through the Aumioversum.

WHAT WE OFFER

- New original content regularly - all about sleep, relaxation and meditation for parents and children
- A free introductory course where children learn the basics of meditation, relaxation and mindfulness
- Playful tools for better relaxation & healthier sleep
- Meditations and mindfulness exercises for kids who love action
- SOS Exercises: Quick help for emergency situations like homework or other challenging moments for parents
- 5-7 minute stories and exercises to help your child calm the chaos in their head
- Daily changing missions
- A constantly growing number of premium content and courses on topics such as anxiety, concentration or restlessness
- Playful design: your child joins Aumio and his friends on his journey from planet to planet, experiences adventures and collects badges and stars
- All content is based on scientific evidence and developed specifically with and for children & families

OUR ROCKET LAUNCH OFFER

Start today and test all stories, sounds and meditations in our free trial period. The free content and your progress will of course remain with you after the trial period.

CONTACT

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help? Then we would be very happy if you sent us an e-mail to contact@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If your family likes the journey through the inner cosmos, please rate us here in the store.

CONDITIONS

In order for us to continuously operate and improve our space offerings, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through iTunes account settings.

And last but not least, even space is not a lawless place: Please find our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy here:
- Terms & Conditions: https://aumio.de/app-agb/
- Privacy Policy: https://aumio.de/datenschutzerklaerung-app/

With our original audio content, weekly updates and parenting advice, we have empowered over 200,000 kids and parents around the world to lead a healthy and happy family life. Hundreds of sleep-stories, meditations and soundscapes help children sleep faster and enjoy relaxed family moments. Based on science, yet truly magical, and recommended by children.

Aumio helps you and your child to
- relax together,
- fall asleep, like on clouds, and
- grow up happy
- and much more

FOR YOUR FAMILY LIFE

Children fall asleep 37 minutes faster. This is what realxed parents tell us. For all children from 0-10 years - Aumio's different content is suitable for all children. As a relaxation music for infants, as a sleep aid after daycare, or to wind down before homework. With valuable features, we ensure that Aumio is a mindful listening experience: ad-free, no data collection, usable in flight mode. Plus, Aumio is listed in the kidSAFE program.

More than 200,000 parents have joined our mission to help kids relax easier, focus better, and manage their emotions. In everyday family life and at school. With Aumio, you get access to hundreds of pieces of content on topics like

- sleep,
- concentration,
- stress & relaxation, or
- anxiety


LISTEN IN AND RELAX

Make your evening the most relaxing family time of the day. Listen to one of our stories right now, and take your child on a journey through the Aumioversum.

WHAT WE OFFER

- New original content regularly - all about sleep, relaxation and meditation for parents and children
- A free introductory course where children learn the basics of meditation, relaxation and mindfulness
- Playful tools for better relaxation & healthier sleep
- Meditations and mindfulness exercises for kids who love action
- SOS Exercises: Quick help for emergency situations like homework or other challenging moments for parents
- 5-7 minute stories and exercises to help your child calm the chaos in their head
- Daily changing missions
- A constantly growing number of premium content and courses on topics such as anxiety, concentration or restlessness
- Playful design: your child joins Aumio and his friends on his journey from planet to planet, experiences adventures and collects badges and stars
- All content is based on scientific evidence and developed specifically with and for children & families

OUR ROCKET LAUNCH OFFER

Start today and test all stories, sounds and meditations in our free trial period. The free content and your progress will of course remain with you after the trial period.

CONTACT

You have something you want to tell us? Or you need some help? Then we would be very happy if you sent us an e-mail to contact@aumio.de. We look forward to hearing from you!

P.S.: If your family likes the journey through the inner cosmos, please rate us here in the store.

CONDITIONS

In order for us to continuously operate and improve our space offerings, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your iTunes account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through iTunes account settings.

And last but not least, even space is not a lawless place: Please find our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy here:
- Terms & Conditions: https://aumio.de/app-agb/
- Privacy Policy: https://aumio.de/datenschutzerklaerung-app/

Indulge in expertly curated sleep training with our weekly updates of original audio books and bedtime stories for kids, sleep sounds and noise. We have empowered over 200,000 children and parents worldwide to help kid’s mindfulness and mental health. Hundreds of bedtime stories for kids, meditation, and sleep sounds help children sleep better and enjoy relaxed family moments. Based on science, yet truly magical, and recommended by children. Sleep better with Aumio.

Sleep better with Aumio: Baby sleep training and kids mindulness:
✓ New original content regularly - sleep music, audio books, bedtime stories, and meditation for kids, toddlers, babies, and parents
✓ A free introductory course where children learn the basics of sleep meditation, relaxation, and mindfulness. Enabling children to be more cautious and attentive.
✓ For all children from 0-10 years - Aumio's different short stories, and baby songs are suitable for all children
✓ Playful tools for better mental health and baby sleep - Sleep sounds, lullaby for sleep, white noise, fan noise and other ASMR sounds for young childrens sleep training.
✓ Sleep Training & Kids mindfulness exercises - Sleep training for kids includes baby sleep sounds, ASMR sounds like (white noise, fan noise etc.) and beautiful lullaby for sleep.
✓ SOS Exercises: Quick help for emergency situations like homework or other challenging moments for parents
✓ 5-7 minute short stories for kids and exercises to help your child calm the chaos in their head
✓ Daily changing missions, and mindfulness exercises.
✓ All audio books and bedtime stories for kids, baby sleep sounds, lullaby music for sleep, and kids mindfulness exercises are based on scientific evidence and developed specifically with and for children and families
✓ Ad-free, no data collection, usable in flight mode
✓ Aumio baby sleep sounds and kids meditation app is listed in the kidSAFE program

Make your evening the most relaxing family time of the day. Listen to one of our bedtime stories right now, and take your child on a journey through the Aumioverse. Aumio will help your child sleep better with it’s sleep training.

Our Mission:
Our mission is to help children sleep better through audio books and bedtime stories for kids, baby sleep sounds, and lullaby music for babies, relax easier with ASMR sounds, and manage their emotions.. With Aumio baby sleep sounds and kids mindfulness app, you get access to hundreds of pieces of content on topics like:
✓ Baby sleep & Kid's Mindfulness
✓Meditation, mindfulness, and concentration
✓Stress, relaxation, and anxiety

Our rocket launch offer:
Sleep better today. Start and test all content like audio books, bedtime stories, sleep music & ASMR sounds in our free trial period. The free content and your progress will of course remain with you after the trial period.

You have something you want to tell us? Then we would be happy if you sent us an e-mail to contact@aumio.de. P.S.: If your family likes the journey through our short stories for kids, please rate us here in the store.

Our conditions:
To continuously operate and improve our bedtime stories, lullaby and baby music, yoga, and meditation exercises, you can support us with a subscription. In addition to the free content, subscriptions give you access to exclusive premium content.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. Your account will be charged for the next subscription term within 24 hours before the current subscription expires. The current in-app subscription term cannot be canceled. However, you can disable the auto-renew feature at any time through account settings.

Our detailed terms and conditions and privacy policy:
✓ Terms and conditions: https://aumio.de/app-agb/
✓ Privacy policy: https://aumio.de/datenschutzerklaerung-app/
